products.title: Arcadia Porcelain Vertical Blind
products.description: If you want to keep your window area simple and streamlined, then the arcadia porcelain vertical blind is a fantastic choice, with rigid pvc vanes and no chains. products.title: Arcadia Sugar White Vertical Blind

products.title: Arcadia Sedate Grey Vertical Blind
products.description: Truly sedate and stylish, this lightly coloured, smoothly textured grey vertical blind will hang with perfect minimalism at your window. The vanes are rigid so require no bottom weights or chains, great for creating a modern streamlined look.
